overview: In a last-ditch effort to save his career, sports agent JB Bernstein dreams up a wild game plan to find Major League Baseball’s next great pitcher from a pool of cricket players in India. He soon discovers two young men who can throw a fastball but know nothing about the game of baseball. Or America. It’s an incredible and touching journey that will change them all — especially JB, who learns valuable lessons about teamwork, commitment and family.
tagline: Sometimes to win, sometimes you have to change the game
cast: Jon Hamm|Bill Paxton|Lake Bell|Suraj Sharma|Aasif Mandvi
